text: In the fast-paced world of cloud technology,

finding the right talent
is crucial for your firm’s success.
But are you looking in the right place?

Because today, it’s entry-level talent
that’s helping organizations thrive.

In fact, in a study commissioned by AWS,
9 out of 10 organizations agreed that

hiring entry-level talent accelerates
innovation and lowers IT-related costs.

It's what we call the full stack approach
to cloud talent management.

Hiring entry level talent in addition
to cloud experts

and build teams with a range of experience
levels from entry level
to cloud proficient to experts.

Because fresh minds and new perspectives
help organizations build resilience
and stay ahead of technical talent demand
and its fast.

Entry level
hires can be sourced

and fully onboarded
in about half the time, as cloud experts
Imagine adapting and

thriving at a speed never before
experienced, thanks to a new pipeline

of eager, excited and energized talent
that's committed to growing with you.

Optimize your talent stack
and find cloud skilled candidates
to fill your open roles.

Connect with talent from
AWS education programs today.
